resources.string: This ChatBot Application is a lightweight version of the real-time AI Assistant and developed in a way that it will only solve the simple general life responses. It is not developed for powerful computations or response.

This ChatBot Application is a lightweight version of the real-time AI Assistant and developed in a way that it will only solve the simple general life responses. It is not developed for powerful computations or response.

This is just a starting version of the Chat Box. Currently, we are working on the heavy-weight chatbot application that can generate the responses like some popular AI tools like ChatGPT, BlackBox and many more.
